change: - The ability to create a proposal now depends on the membership status of the current instead of the snapshot block.

prepareInstallation.description: The information required for the installation.

components.name: votingMode
components.description: A parameter to select the vote mode. In standard mode (0), early execution and vote replacement are disabled. In early execution mode (1), a proposal can be executed early before the end date if the vote outcome cannot mathematically change by more voters voting. In vote replacement mode (2), voters can change their vote multiple times and only the latest vote option is tallied.

components.name: supportThreshold
components.description: The support threshold value. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6] defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: minParticipation
components.description: The minimum participation value. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6] defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: minDuration
components.description: The minimum duration of the proposal vote in seconds.

components.name: minProposerVotingPower
components.description: The minimum voting power required to create a proposal.

inputs.name: votingSettings
inputs.description: The voting settings that will be enforced when proposals are created.

inputs.name: members
inputs.description: The addresses of the initial members to be added.

1.description: No input is required for the update.

prepareUninstallation.description: No input is required for the uninstallation.
